Trade/Device Name(s): Optium Plus Blood Glucose Test Strips
Precision Xtra Plus Blood Glucose Test Strips
MediSense Optium Plus Blood Glucose Test Strips
Precision Easy Blood Glucose Test Strips
MediSense Optium Easy Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Precision Xtra Advanced Diabetes Management System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Optium Plus and Precision Xtra Plus Blood Glucose Test Strips for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary blood using amperometric biosensor technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in-vitro quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary blood for self-testing by lay users or use by health care professionals, for monitoring blood glucose concentrations in persons with diabetes and other conditions.
